content: the measurements of the dog chest approx 28/32 40/44 48/52 cm / 11/12½ 15/17 19/20½ back length approx 24 32 - 40 cm / 9½ 12½ 15¾ examples of sizes of dogs xs = chihuahau s = bichon frise m = cocker spaniel materials drops alaska from garnstudio 100-150-250 g color no 11 deep red drops double popinted needle size 4 5 mm / us 7 or the size needed to obtain the correct knitting gauge drops crochet hook size 4 mm / us g/6 drops buffalohorn buttons no 535 4 pcs
